entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
